ambition.question: Did I allow my desire for power and dominance to influence how I interacted with those in positions of authority or responsibility?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

greed.question: Did I make accumulating wealth, possessions, and material goods a driving force in my life?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

oppression.question: Did I unjustly dominate, intimidate, or bully others through my words and actions?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: through my words , actions , or deeds
on whether you have unfairly imposed your will , authority , or power upon individuals in any situation , disregarding their dignity as human beings created in the image of God
as human beings created in the image of God
oppression.question:
Have I mistreated, harassed, or discriminated against others through my words, actions, or deeds? 

(In considering this, reflect on whether you have unfairly imposed your will, authority, or power upon individuals in any situation, disregarding their dignity as human beings created in the image of God.)
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the good things in my life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the benefits and opportunities in my life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted my accomplishments, forgetting to acknowledge the role of God's providence in achieving them?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I felt discontent for someone's good fortune and secretly wished they would lose it?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: in using words that were hurtful or disrespectfully spoken to others
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control in using words that were hurtful or disrespectfully spoken to others?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in using hurtful words to express yourself to others
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control in using hurtful words to express yourself to others?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: to overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you permit yourself to overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
especially in your social gatherings and celebrations
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially in your social gatherings and celebrations?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what was reasonable
to the point where it became an excessive preoccupation for you
gluttony.question: Did you indulge in eating or drinking beyond what was reasonable, to the point where it became an excessive preoccupation for you?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: rather than nursing resentment and holding onto feelings of rage
anger.question: Have I allowed anger to simmer in my heart, refusing to seek forgiveness and healing with loved ones, rather than nursing resentment and holding onto feelings of rage?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
